dc_title_s: Vicariati e prefetture apostoliche nelle Indie Orientali.
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale not given (E 58째--E 110째/N 33째--N 1째). Relief shown by hachures. Map showing the boundaries of Catholic dioceses in South and Southeast Asia in the 1850s. Probably Tav. CIII from: L'orbe cattolico ossia Atlante geografico storico ecclesiastico / [opera del commendatore Girolamo Petri]. Roma : Tipografia della reverenda Camera apostolica, 1858-1859.|48 x 63 centimeters|Scale not given.|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
